speak.voice: Hello, how may I help you today?

mstts:express-as.prosody: I really need help with my credit card, it's not working at all

speak.voice: May I please have your first and last name?
Thank you Mr Doh, can you confirm the last four digits of your account number?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Which number? Is that the card number or the number on my statement, I don't have a statement in front of me.

speak.voice: It should be the last four digits printed on your credit card.

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Ok, let me get it, my wallet is in the other room. I have it now, the number is 4 3 2 1

speak.voice: Thank you again Mr Doh. It looks like there is suspected fraud on your credit card. Can you confirm the last purchase you made?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: I tried to use it to book an Air Bee En Bee for my daughter.

speak.voice: Can you confirm the charge amount?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: I don't know. it was about two thousand dollars for a stay in December in Florida.

speak.voice: Ok I can confirm the amount now, our system detected it as fraud but since you have confirmed it we will mark it as approved. Please proceed with your booking.

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: I hope I can get the same house. bookings were hard to find in that area. I'm going to try now.
ok it looks like the booking went through thank you

speak.voice: Is there anything else I can help you with?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Yes, as a matter of fact. I want to order another card for my daughter to use.

speak.voice: Sure, I can help you with that, can I have her first and last name?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: Jane, J A N E, Doh, D O E.

speak.voice: What address can I mail the card to?

voice.name: en-US-GuyNeural
voice.prosody: You can mail it to the default address on Pine Wood Ave.

speak.voice: Ok you can expect the card in 1 to 2 business days.Is there anything else?
No thank you for your help.
